changeSet.comment: update table WS_PLUGIN_TB_BACKEND_MSG_LOG column MESSAGE_ENTITY_ID with TB_USER_MESSAGE.ID_PK
changeSet.sql: UPDATE WS_PLUGIN_TB_BACKEND_MSG_LOG LG JOIN TB_USER_MESSAGE MSG ON LG.MESSAGE_ID=MSG.MESSAGE_ID JOIN TB_D_MSH_ROLE R ON MSG.MSH_ROLE_ID_FK=R.ID_PK AND R.ROLE='RECEIVING' SET LG.MESSAGE_ENTITY_ID=MSG.ID_PK;

UPDATE WS_PLUGIN_TB_BACKEND_MSG_LOG LG JOIN TB_USER_MESSAGE MSG ON LG.MESSAGE_ID=MSG.MESSAGE_ID JOIN TB_D_MSH_ROLE R ON MSG.MSH_ROLE_ID_FK=R.ID_PK AND R.ROLE='RECEIVING' SET LG.MESSAGE_ENTITY_ID=MSG.ID_PK;
